abs_plot_module¶

abs_plot_module.draw_abs_figure()¶

Makes a flux vs velocity graph, that also has the error vs velocity on the same graph. Has text that identifies what the graph number is, what the spectra name is, the signal to noise ratio, and the redshift value used.

Parameters

  • kind (int or array[int]) – spectra_count_abs

  • kind – spectra_index

  • kind – velocity

  • kind – flux_normalized

  • kind – error

  • kind – savefile_name

  • kind – spectra_name

  • kind – redshift

  • kind – snr

  • kind – max_peak

Description

Keeping record of how many absorption plots have been found.

Description

The index number of the graph you are plotting.

Description

The velocity values to plot on the x-axis.

Description

The flux values that will be plotted on the y-axis.

Description

The error values to be plotted.

Description

The name that you want the plot to be saved as.

Description

The full name of the spectra.

Description

The redshift value used for calculations.

Description

The signal to noise ratio value.

Description

The max peak value which is used to scale the y-axis.

Returns

none

Previous topic

abs_function_module

Next topic

normalization
